title: Ticket #6978: Add job attribute indicating shadow/starter disconnect
description:
Currently, there's nothing in the job ad that indicates when the shadow and starter are disconnected. There is a job log event and an attribute that counts the number of successful reconnects. Having an attribute in the job ad would be useful for monitoring and possibly for job policy expressions.

I propose adding the attribute JobDisconnectedDate, which is set to the time at which the shadow notices the disconnection. It would be set to Undefined upon a successful reconnect.
